item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0135; 02:48AM; 7131 N Owensmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wYUnaO; Canoga Park; KNOCKDOWN: 43 firefighters extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. Their quick action prevented the fire from extending into the commercial structure. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E104 E105 E296 E305 E72 E73 E84 EM17 RA105 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0135; 02:15AM; 7127 N Owensmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wYUnaO; Canoga Park; One story, commercial building with heavy fire in a carport to the rear of the building - exposing the structure. There is also fire in two dumpsters. Additional resources requested.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E104 E105 E296 E305 E72 E73 E84 EM17 RA105 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker - FATALITY; INC#0677; 12:10PM; 3077 Rustic Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lSEMV1; Pacific Palisades; At 11:39AM, the LAFD responded to Will Rogers Park for a hiker rescue. LAFD Air Ops located the patient and lowered two rescuers down. They conducted a patient assessment and determined death for an approximately 35yo male patient. The incident is being transitioned to LAPD and LA County Coroner. Any further questions are referred to those agencies. LAPD Inc# 1900; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 BP19 E19 E269 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA37 RH114 T69; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1075; 06:55PM; 6881 N Troost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PJi5AF; North Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 46 minutes with no injuries reported. The crews worked aggressively to contain the fire to the building of origin, defended the adjacent buildings barely separated by a few feet. LAFD Arson is on scene for the investigation per protocol for a Greater Alarm fire. Crews will remain on scene through the night chasing down any remaining hot spots and keeping a fire watch. No further updates anticipated. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; CH8; 16 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1075; 06:10PM; 6881 N Troost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PJi5AF; North Hollywood; Firefighters are making good progress against the blaze. After a tactical pause (temporarily stop the flow of heavy streams to evaluate the fire), crews are addressing the existing hot spots. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CE13 CM42 E102 E227 E239 E260 E288 E289 E60 E77 E81 E86 E88 EA1 EM11 EM15 EM17 HR3 PH1 RA102 RA60 RA86 RA889 T27 T39 T60 T88 T89 UR27 UR88; CH9; 16 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1075; 05:25PM; 6881 N Troost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PJi5AF; North Hollywood; Due to a roof collapse on the Alpha side (front, address) of the building, all firefighters were ordered out of the structure and an accountability report (to ensure all companies are safe and out of the building) was conducted. All firefighters are safe and accounted for and the incident will transition to the defensive mode. No injuries reported.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM42 E102 E227 E239 E260 E288 E289 E60 E77 E81 E86 E88 EM11 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA102 RA60 RA86 RA889 T27 T39 T60 T88 T89 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1075; 05:09PM; 6881 N Troost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PJi5AF; North Hollywood; One story, commercial building with fire showing. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 E102 E239 E260 E60 E86 RA102 RA60 T39 T60; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue; INC#1656; 09:35PM; 6846 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1yVB1; Van Nuys; A traffic collision resulted in multiple trapped patients. Firefights used hydraulic rescue tools to free them from the wreckage. Two have been transported to the hospital in moderate-to-serious condition. One declined transport on scene. LAPD Inc #4575. Nothing further.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E289 E81 E90 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA839 T39 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
